title: News in your chrome's new tab that learns your preferences

content: rowe news taboffered tanmay patil(5)170 usersoverviewget news your choiceget news right your tab. over 70 sources over world, choose news! don't to remember visit each every news source . simple glance top news your favourite sources an elegant clean ui.features:* automatically detects news sources are favorites adds into favorites collection* share news social media just click a button* offline support the news sources you visited least once* categorization your news sourcesstay tuned more features.report abuseadditional informationversion:0.0.8updated:june 13, 2017size:271kiblanguage:english
